categories: Category:Sith Lords of the reconstituted Sith Empire

nodes.text: Fatalissar was a male Sith Lord of the Sith Empire. He declared a Kaggath against his rival, Darth Tormen, while within arm's reach of Tormen on the planet Ziost; however, when Fatalissar decreed the domain of the Kaggath to be the planet's surface, Tormen decapitated him mid-sentence, winning the duel.
